summary: The Contoso Wireless service offers two different internet packages with different speeds and prices. The 25 Mbps package is $50 per month, while the 100 Mbps package is $100 per month. Both packages come with unlimited data, no overage fees, 24/7 technical support, and access to an online customer portal. Customers can contact customer service via phone, email, chat, or through the help center on the website. Additionally, there are discounts and promotions available for customers who sign up for a year-long subscription or who check the website or social media pages for occasional promotions.
